estimation.translation[0].definitions[0]: a judgment or opinion about someone or something
go up/come down in somebody’s estimation (=be respected or admired more or less by someone)
In your estimation, who’s going to win?
estimation.translation[0].definitions[1]: a calculation of the value, size, amount etc of something
Estimations of total world sales are around the 50 million mark.
estimation.translation[1].definitions[0]: your opinion of the value, nature etc of someone or something
His skills and abilities make him, in my estimation, an ideal candidate for the board of governors.
estimation.translation[1].definitions[1]: a calculation of what the value, size, amount etc of something will probably be
